persona.mission_statement: To empower organizations to anticipate, withstand, and recover from disruptions, ensuring business continuity and safeguarding operations for employees, customers, and communities.

core_products.name: Backup Power
core_products.description: On-demand backup power solutions, including generator delivery and support, to ensure facilities remain operational during grid failures and avoid surge pricing.

core_products.name: Workspace Recovery
core_products.description: Provides temporary, fully equipped workspace environments, including private offices and meeting rooms, to enable continued business operations during crises or planned inaccessibility.

core_products.name: Backup Technology & Equipment
core_products.description: Offers end-to-end technology recovery, including secure internet connectivity (broadband, satellite, LTE/5G), data backup and recovery, and replacement IT hardware deployment.

core_products.name: Risk Planning & Testing
core_products.description: Services to identify vulnerabilities through detailed risk analysis, create tailored continuity plans, validate defenses with penetration testing, and ensure compliance with industry regulations.

core_products.name: Cyber Resilience
core_products.description: Comprehensive solutions for information security, data protection, cyberattack prevention, breach response, recovery support, and ransomware impact analysis.

core_products.name: Data Backup & Recovery
core_products.description: Instant recovery of data and systems by spinning up virtual machine replicas locally or in the cloud, featuring agent-based backup, support for 100+ operating systems, and military-grade encryption.

target_markets.ideal_customer_profile: Organizations across critical sectors that require robust, proven solutions to minimize downtime, protect sensitive data, ensure operational continuity, and maintain compliance in the face of natural disasters, cyberattacks, planned outages, or other disruptions.
